languages.text: Прошел слух, что среди каторжан есть несколько варп-проводников — несанкционированное подобие навигаторов. Возможно, их стоит отыскать и поставить на службу.
There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.
languages.original_text: Прошел слух, что среди каторжан есть несколько варп-проводников — несанкционированное подобие навигаторов. Возможно, их стоит отыскать и поставить на службу.

traits.locale_text: There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.
There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.
There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.
There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.
There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.

languages.text: Le bruit court que plusieurs guides du Warp, des sortes de navigateurs non assermentés, se trouveraient parmi les condamnés. Cela pourrait valoir la peine de les débusquer pour les mettre à votre service.
languages.original_text: There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.

traits.locale_text: Le bruit court que plusieurs guides du Warp, des sortes de navigateurs non assermentés, se trouveraient parmi les condamnés. Cela pourrait valoir la peine de les débusquer pour les mettre à votre service.

languages.text: 囚人の中にワープガイド、というより航宙士に似た非公認のワープガイドが数人いるという噂がある。彼らを探し出し、強制的に任務に就かせるのもいいだろう。
languages.original_text: There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.

traits.locale_text: 囚人の中にワープガイド、というより航宙士に似た非公認のワープガイドが数人いるという噂がある。彼らを探し出し、強制的に任務に就かせるのもいいだろう。

languages.text: 有传言说，犯人之中有好几位亚空间向导，他们的能力与导航者相似，但未得到帝国许可。若能抓住他们，让他们为你所用，这会是一桩划算的买卖。
languages.original_text: There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.

traits.locale_text: 有传言说，犯人之中有好几位亚空间向导，他们的能力与导航者相似，但未得到帝国许可。若能抓住他们，让他们为你所用，这会是一桩划算的买卖。

languages.text: Corre el rumor de que hay varios guías de la disformidad entre los convictos, semblanzas no autorizadas de los Navegantes. Puede que merezca la pena cazarlos y ponerlos a trabajar.
languages.original_text: There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.

traits.locale_text: Corre el rumor de que hay varios guías de la disformidad entre los convictos, semblanzas no autorizadas de los Navegantes. Puede que merezca la pena cazarlos y ponerlos a trabajar.

languages.text: Es geht das Gerücht um, dass es unter den Sträflingen mehrere Warpführer gibt — unlizenzierte Navigatoren. Es könnte sich lohnen, sie aufzuspüren und zum Dienst zu zwingen.
languages.original_text: There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.

traits.locale_text: Es geht das Gerücht um, dass es unter den Sträflingen mehrere Warpführer gibt — unlizenzierte Navigatoren. Es könnte sich lohnen, sie aufzuspüren und zum Dienst zu zwingen.

languages.text: Mahkûmların arasında birkaç öteboyut kılavuzu bulunduğuna dair söylentiler dolanıyor. Rotacıların onaysız hâlleri olan bu kimselerin peşine düşüp hizmet etmelerini sağlamak faydalı olabilir.
languages.original_text: There is a rumour that there are several warp guides among the convicts — unsanctioned semblances of Navigators. It may be worth it to hunt them down and press them into service.
